componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
You need to create a RLCS Quote.


This Quote will create a RLES job, you must now create RLCS jobs.

componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: This account has a commercial agreement in place where a rebate is paid relative to their spend with us. Please apply margin accordingly.

componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Client uses a rate card with a set sales price. Please work backwards from this.

componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Client uses a rate card. Please enter their buy rate so that Supply Chain can work backwards and get a better rate.

componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Account is currently Inactive. Before a PO can be created the Account it must be approved, have a credit application and SAGE Ref number.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This quote has been created against a supplier which is missing some compliance information. Please check Quote Line Items.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This quote is related to an opportunity that has not been allocated the opportunity estimated value. Please ensure this is completed before adding item pricing.
